attributes.action: change the constitution such that an unelected Prime Minister must call a General Election within 12 months of taking office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the event that there is a change of a Prime Minister during the course of a parliament, the incoming Prime Minister must call a General Election no more than 12 months after taking office.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition that already exists on the petitions website. However we recognise that your petition differs slightly. If you would still like us to accept your petition please resubmit. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/InterimElection/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
